com.yantra.pca.ycd.japi.ue

Interface YCDProcessReturnCompletionUE


  • public interface YCDProcessReturnCompletionUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document processReturnCompletion(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inDoc)
      processReturnCompletion user exit calls two different multiApis.

    • Method Detail

      • processReturnCompletion

        org.w3c.dom.Document processReturnCompletion(YFSEnvironment env,
                                             org.w3c.dom.Document inDoc)
                                      throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        processReturnCompletion user exit calls two different multiApis. This user exit is called on selecting the Confirm button in the Confirm Payment screen of Store Return and Exchange.

        The first multi API includes the following API calls:
        The confirmOrder API: This API has return order header key as input to confirm a return order and has exchange order header key as input to confirm an exchange order,if applicable.
        The changeOrderStatus API: This API is called to move the return status from Created to Authorized.
        The scheduleOrder API: This API is called to schedule and release the return.
        The startReceipt API: This API is called to create a receipt for the return.

        The second multi API includes the following API calls:
        The recordReceiptInOneStep API: This API is called to record the receipt and save the disposition code on the receipt.
        The closeReceipt API: This API is called to close the receipt of the return order.
        The createOrderInvoice API: This API is called with the order header key and the appropriate transaction identifier as inputs to create a return invoice.



        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None


        Input Template Support: Yes

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inDoc - Required. For more information, see the associated input files.


        Returns:
        An XML document. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
